column2: (verb) to catch and arrest someone who has not obeyed the law
(verb) to discover something // to make certain of something
(adj) involving long and diffiult dealings with officials
(verb) to criticize something or someone strongly, usually for moral reasons
(noun) one or more reasons for believing that something is or is not true
(verb) to show that someone is involved in a crime or partly responsible for something bad that has happened
(adv) affecting someone in a way that annoys them and makes them feel uncomfortable
(verb) to take using sudden force // to take something quickly and keep or hold it
(noun) the careful watching of a person or place, especially by the police or army, because of a crime that has happened or is expected
